inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to provide informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Within the enrollment window: 2 days after completion of antimicrobial therapy for CDI (to allow for a washout period) to 14 days after completion of therapy or 30 days after the onset of CDI whichever is later.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy, planning to be pregnant, or breastfeeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of cytotoxic chemotherapy, intravenous or subcutaneous immune globulin, or confirmed neutropenia (absolute neutrophil count of < 1,000 cells/ L) within the past 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has symptoms consistent with CDI and laboratory confirmation. No contraindications noted.
